Items.Title: Application no.20055595 TCM, pursuant to §20-22(6) of the Administrative Code of the City of New York, concerning the petition of Anhanguera Food Corp., d/b/a Ecco-La, to establish,maintain and operated an unenclosed sidewalk café located 1660 Third Avenue, Borough of Manhattan, Council District no. 4.  This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if called-up by vote of the Council pursuant to Rule 11.20b of the Council and §20-22(6)(g) of the New York City Administrative Code.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee

This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if called-up by vote of the Council pursuant to Rule 11.20b of the Council and §20-226(g) of the New York City Administrative Code.

Items.Title: Uniform land use review procedure application no.   050163 PCM, pursuant to §197-c and §197-d of the New York City Charter, concerning the site selection and acquisition of real property known as the Highline elevated rail structure, Borough of Manhattan, Council District no. 3, for use as a public Open space.
